title: Arsenal v Spurs: Pochettino on Eriksen's future and Emery on Xhaka's performance – video
text:
Arsenal came from two goals behind to earn a point in a dramatic north London derby at the Emirates stadium. The away side took the lead early on with a tap-in from Christian Erkisen. The future of the Spurs midfielder is still in doubt, Mauricio Pochettino said that 'nothing is impossible in football' when asked about the rumoured Dane's departure.



The Gunners went two goals down after captain Granit Xhaka brought down Son Heung-min. Arsenal manager Unai Emery stood by the midfielder, despite being 'very disappointed' by the challenge on the South Korean
description: Tottenham midfielder Christian Eriksen future remains in the balance as Pochettino admits 'nothing is impossible in football'
